title: 新约 - 提摩太前书(1 Timothy) - 第 2 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 提摩太前书(1 Timothy) -- 第 2 章 ( 本篇共有 6 章 )

lineList.en: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;
lineList.cn: 我劝你第一要为万人恳求祷告，代求，祝谢。

lineList.en: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.
lineList.cn: 为君王和一切在位的也该如此。使我们可以敬虔端正，平安无事的度日。

lineList.en: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
lineList.cn: 这是好的，在神我们救主面前可蒙悦讷。

lineList.en: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
lineList.cn: 他愿意万人得救，明白真道。

lineList.en: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
lineList.cn: 因为只有一位神，在神和人中间，只有一位中保，乃是降世为人的基督耶稣。

lineList.en: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.
lineList.cn: 他舍自己作万人的赎价。到了时候，这事必证明出来。

lineList.en: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.
lineList.cn: 我为此奉派，作传道的，作使徒，作外邦人的师傅，教导他们相信，学习涉道。我说的是真话，并不是谎言。

lineList.en: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
lineList.cn: 我愿男人无忿怒，无争论，（争论或作疑惑），举起圣洁的手，随处祷告。

lineList.en: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
lineList.cn: 又愿女人廉耻，自守，以正派衣裳为妆饰，不以编发，黄金，珍珠，和贵价的衣裳为妆饰。

lineList.en: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.
lineList.cn: 只要有善行。这才与自称是敬神的女人相宜。

lineList.en: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
lineList.cn: 女人要沉静学道，一味的顺服。

lineList.en: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
lineList.cn: 我不许女人讲道，也不许他辖管男人，只要沉静。

lineList.en: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.
lineList.cn: 因为先造的是亚当，后造的是夏娃。

lineList.en: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.
lineList.cn: 且不是亚当被引诱，乃是女人被引诱，陷在罪里。

lineList.en: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
lineList.cn: 然而女人若常存信心爱心，又圣洁自守，就必在生产上得救。
